content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.

content: Hello Ryanah, thank you for considering my apartment for rent. I am looking to maximize my gains, so I am open to discussing a fair rental price with you. What are your thoughts?

content: I agree to the price of 500 Euro per month. Thank you for your time.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your offer, Ryanah. I appreciate your interest in my apartment and I am willing to negotiate with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement. However, I would like to clarify a few things before we finalize the rental price. May I know how long you plan on staying in the apartment? Also, is there a specific move-in date that you have in mind? This information will help me to determine the best rental price for you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I plan on staying in the apartment for 1 year. My move-in date is on 1st of July.

Also, I would like to clarify that I am a student and I am looking for a budget-friendly apartment. I am dependable and responsible, and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I want to make sure that I can afford the rental price and I can also pay my bills on time.

I hope this information is helpful. Let me know if you need any further details.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for providing me with this information, Ryanah. I appreciate your honesty and transparency. Based on your needs and the current rental market in the area, I believe that the rental price of 500 Euro per month is fair and reasonable. I am willing to agree to this price, provided that you are able to pay your bills on time and that you maintain a good relationship with me as your landlord.

If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to let me know. I am happy to work with you to find a mutually beneficial solution.
name: Heinrich Heine
